```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)   
library(moderndive)  
```

# Load the dataset
```{r}
data("early_january_weather")
```
This data set has `r nrow(early_january_weather)` rows and `r ncol(early_january_weather)` columns. This data is the hourly temperature from EWR in 2013. The variables that are listed are origin, year, day, time, hour, temp, dewp, humid, wind_dir, wind_speed, wind_gust,precip, pressure, visib, and time_hour.With mean `r  mean(early_january_weather$temp, na.rm = TRUE)` degrees.
